EmailTemplate.name: HR Request
EmailTemplate.subject: HR Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We encourage you to visit our careers website where you will find all currently available jobs.
Alternatively, you can also visit www.abb.com/careers to explore global career opportunities.
The application can be submitted to a specific job advertisement or you can register your CV for recruiters to contact you directly.
This will allow us to track your application better and also provide you with the status of your application.
